title: A Little Fun
report: t+00:00- feeling normal, just can't get the taste out of my mouth
t+00:15- legs starting to feel a little heavy, slight sedation feeling
t+00:30- starting to feel warm, and have a slight headache
t+00:45- slight mental high, still feel heavy and warm, headache is gone
t+03:15- feel completly normal, except for a headache

erowid.citation: HPRC. "A Little Fun: experience with Leonotis leonurum (25x extract) (ID 65961)". Erowid.org. Sep 24, 2007. erowid.org/exp/65961
